title.rendered: HSP Taillock Tailgate Central Locking (With Plug And Play Wiring) – Toyota Hilux Revo (SR5) 2015+

content.rendered:
HSP Taillock Tailgate Central Locking (With Plug And Play Wiring) – Toyota Hilux Revo (SR5) 2015+ Suits Models 2015-September 2017 (with Barrel Lock)

The HSP Tail lock is truly a revolutionary product allowing you to sync your tailgate with your existing vehicle remote. Installation takes less than an hour as there is no drilling required along with simple wiring.
The Tail Lock gives peace of mind knowing that when your car is locked, so is the tailgate. This system works with Toyota Hilux MY18+ A-Deck with an existing barrel lock. For My18+ with a barrel lock please use part number H18

– Syncs with your factory remote.
– Hidden non-intrusive design.
– Works with proximity remote.
– Gives ultimate security for your tub.
